title: 09/27: Start or Sit (NFC); PHI-GB; Week 4 Sleepers! (Fantasy Football Podcast)
description:
Reacting to Philadelphia's big win over the Packers! Who is the best Eagles RB to own? Should we be worried about Aaron Jones? What would this Packers offense look like if Davante Adams misses time, and is Zach Ertz on bust alert??? ... Fun stats (15:00) including something that might concern Todd Gurley owners, news and notes (17:15), Austin Ekeler's dynasty value (21:00), Week 4 sleepers at each position (22:15), "Start, Sit, or Flex" (30:00) and Beat the Waiver Wire (33:00)! ... MIN-CHI (36:15), TEN-ATL (44:20), KC-DET (50:30), TB-LAR (56:30), WAS-NYG (1:00:30), SEA-ARI (1:05:00), DAL-NO (1:08:00) ... Your emails at fantasyfootball@cbsi.com
 
To learn more about listener data and our privacy practices visit: https://www.audacyinc.com/privacy-policy
  
 Learn more about your ad choices. Visit https://podcastchoices.com/adchoices
itunes:author: CBS Sports, Fantasy Football, Rookies, Rankings, Waiver Wire
itunes:subtitle: Have a tough lineup decision to make for Week 4? We'll preview the NFC home games to help you out and give you some sleepers. We also recap PHI-GB and play Beat the Waiver Wire.
